sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT compound_id, source_id, substance_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id FROM ApidbTuning.CompoundAttributes

sqlQuery.name: Synonyms
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ca.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, apidb.tab_to_string(set(CAST(COLLECT(s2.value) AS apidb.varchartab)),', ') as synonyms FROM apidb.pubchemsubstance s1, apidb.pubchemsubstance s2, ApidbTuning.CompoundAttributes ca WHERE s1.property = 'CID' AND s1.value = ca.compound_id AND s2.property = 'synonyms' AND s1.substance_id = s2.substance_id GROUP BY ca.source_id UNION -- case of substance having no compound SELECT ca.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, apidb.tab_to_string(set(CAST(COLLECT(s.value) AS apidb.varchartab)),', ') as synonyms FROM apidb.pubchemsubstance s, ApidbTuning.CompoundAttributes ca WHERE s.property = 'synonyms' AND ca.source_id = 'SID:' || s.substance_id GROUP BY ca.source_id UNION -- case of compound/substance that has NO synonyms (SELECT distinct ca.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, '-' as synonymns FROM ApidbTuning.CompoundAttributes ca, apidb.PubChemSubstance s, (SELECT distinct substance_id FROM apidb.PubChemSubstance MINUS SELECT distinct substance_id FROM apidb.PubChemSubstance WHERE property='synonyms' ) diff WHERE s.substance_id = diff.substance_id AND ca.substance_id like diff.substance_id)

sqlQuery.name: PathwaysCount
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT count (distinct pc.network_id) as pathway_count, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, pc.compound_source_id as source_id from ApiDBTuning.PathwayCompounds pc group by pc.compound_source_id
